page.title: 17EXETER MINI-BUS SERVICE
page.content: Recently in Exeter there has been introduced a{Mini-Bus Service.}They are replacing the old double-deckers on the{city bus routes.}They can carry up to about fifteen people.They are small and so inexpensive to run and are quicker.One thing that is really helpful is that you don't have to wait at stops you can wave them down.They are useful if you want to go into town quickly. They only operate on certain routes such as Cowick Street- City Centre though.They usually have about two on a service they'd use a double-decker bus for. I think they should extend this service to other places even remote towns.I also think they should have an{Express and special services for special occasions such as the Carnival or the Festival.
